attributes.action: Stop the Bombing of Civilians and Hospitals in Syria
attributes.background: The Syrian regime and others have been deliberately targeting the civilian populations and hospitals in rebel held areas of Syria. This government needs to exert more pressure on the international community to take action in protecting innocent people and end the war in Syria

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to stop this unilaterally. You could start a petition calling for the UK Government to exert pressure to protect civilians and hospitals in Syria.
